definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="5" y="37"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_is_tagged_in"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="tag"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">minecraft:undead</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">INSTANT_HEALTH</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">INSTANT_DAMAGE</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.3</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_type"><field name="damagetype">PLAYER_ATTACK</field></block></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_random_int_between"><value name="min"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">CRIT</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
